message.content:
cs.DC, cs.AR, cs.OS, cs.SE, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses using non-volatile memory (NVM) for high-performance computing (HPC) and handling failures in HPC applications. This suggests that the paper could belong to the Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC) category. Additionally, the paper discusses fault tolerance and recomputation, which could fall under the category of Architecture (cs.AR). The paper also introduces a framework for selectively persisting application data objects, which could be considered an operating system (cs.OS) or software engineering (cs.SE) topic. Finally, the paper discusses system efficiency, which could fall under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY).
